before_start: {"blocks":[{"key":"6uglc","text":"The tissues need to be perfused with fresh PBS and flash-frozen in liquid nitrogen","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
description: {"blocks":[{"key":"29jbe","text":"This protocol is designed for a standardized and efficient procedure to homogenize mouse tissue, conducive for RT-QuIC analysis. The process involves treating samples with PBS mixed with Triton-X100, followed by homogenization using a prob-tip sonicator. Centrifugation is then employed to remove detergent-insoluble fraction, optimizing the tissue for subsequent \nanalysis. The use of Triton-X100, a mild detergent, ensures the release of alpha-synuclein aggregates, enhancing signal specificity without compromising structural integrity. The protocol's significance lies in addressing the critical need for a reliable method in preparing mouse tissue for RT-QuIC analysis, with the distinct signal generated in assays validating its efficacy. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

related_materials.name: Low Protein Binding Collection Tubes (1.5 mL)

status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"5ds9k","text":"Measure the weight of each eppendorf tube using analytical scale and label the tube with assigned number","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"akj53","text":"  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":1,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"co44r","text":"   ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":1,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"reagents","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"can_edit":false,"cas_number":"","guid":"41A6AFB7341F11EE9D4302C0B41BC903","linfor":"","mol_weight":0,"name":"Protein LoBind Tubes, 1.5 mL","pubchem_id":"0","public":1,"rrid":"","sku":"0030108116","stats":{"total_protocols":7},"url":"https://online-shop.eppendorf.com/OC-en/Laboratory-Consumables-44512/Tubes-44515/Protein-LoBind-Tubes-PF-56251.html","vendor":{"id":521,"image":{"placeholder":null,"source":"/img/vendors/placeholder.png"},"is_requested":false,"link":"","name":"VWR International"}}},"1":{"type":"reagents","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"can_edit":false,"cas_number":"","guid":"41F6B60F341F11EE9D4302C0B41BC903","linfor":null,"mol_weight":0,"name":"Low Protein Binding Collection Tubes (1.5 mL)","pubchem_id":"0","public":1,"rrid":"","sku":"90411","stats":{"total_protocols":0},"url":"https://www.thermofisher.com/order/catalog/product/90411","vendor":{"id":521,"image":{"placeholder":null,"source":"/img/vendors/440.png"},"is_requested":false,"link":"","name":"VWR International"}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3ci25","text":"Cut a tissue slice (around 100-200 mg) with a disposable blade on a plastic plate lid wrapped in a foil (all on ice), transfer to the Eppendorf protein low-binding tube (with known weight)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7k1oj","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"9g14","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"safety","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"e4et2","text":"biohazard; place disposable blades into biohazard needle container; material should be thrown away into biohazard bags previously placed into tube or a 15 mL falcon (secondary container)","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6rqlo","text":"Measure the weight of the tissue piece in a tube using analytical scales ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"chope","text":"Subtract weight of the tube to obtain the final weight of the brain slice (indicate the weight in the table)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"h7t4","text":"Add 20 vol weight/volume of PBS buffer containing 1%Tx100 and protease/phosphatase inhibitors (  ,  (for example, 100 mg – 5 mL)  - transfer to 15 mL falcon tube;","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":95,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":98,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"gn5p","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"reagents","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"cas_number":"","group_reagent":{},"guid":"614DBF9A9BB24CBB84D5864EBA0F388F","id":"","linfor":"","mol_weight":0,"name":"Roche PhosSTOP EasyPack","rrid":"","sku":"4906837001","url":"http://","vendor":{"id":17,"image":{"placeholder":"/img/vendors/placeholder.png","source":"/img/vendors/placeholder.png"},"is_requested":false,"link":"http://sigmaaldrich.com","name":"Merck MilliporeSigma (Sigma-Aldrich)"}}},"1":{"type":"reagents","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"cas_number":"","group_reagent":{},"guid":"B286F52A81DA4F639860E4C2E848DAD4","id":"","linfor":"","mol_weight":0,"name":"Roche cOmplete Tablets EDTA-free, EasyPack","rrid":"","sku":"4693132001","url":"http://","vendor":{"id":17,"image":{"placeholder":"/img/vendors/placeholder.png","source":"/img/vendors/placeholder.png"},"is_requested":false,"link":"http://sigmaaldrich.com","name":"Merck MilliporeSigma (Sigma-Aldrich)"}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"821bu","text":"Sonicate tissue samples for  , 5 sec ON and 15 sec OFF ( );","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":28,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":56,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"72cqg","text":"Use 0.16 inch microtip for homogenization","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9gqpk","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":2,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"ht6k","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":60,"guid":"F527249021AF11EDA59D9B7AA22E9DCE","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"1":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":60,"error_temperature":false,"guid":"D470F78021AF11EDA59D9B7AA22E9DCE","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"scientificNotation":false,"start":null,"temperature":"","unit":165}},"2":{"type":"equipment","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"brand":"Fisherbrand","can_edit":0,"file":{"icon":"","id":null,"name":"","source":""},"guid":"452AA058341F11EE9D4302C0B41BC903","image":{"icon":"","id":null,"name":"","source":""},"link":"https://www.fishersci.com/shop/products/fisher-scientific-model-120-sonic-dismembrator-4/p-3974654","name":"Fisherbrand Model 120 Sonic Dismembrator","sku":"FB120110","specifications":"Equipped with 1/8\" probe","type":"Sonicator","vendor":{"id":31,"image":{"placeholder":"/img/vendors/placeholder.png","source":"/img/vendors/placeholder.png"},"is_requested":false,"link":"https://www.fishersci.com/us/en/home.html","name":"Fisher Scientific"}}}}}
